name: [Unofficial]TwitchChannelInfo
0:
”Alexa ask channel info for information about monstercat”
”Alexa tell channel info to tell me about monstercat”
”Alexa ask channel info for help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: channel info
des: This skill will tell you if your provided twitch streamer is offline, and if they are not, it will tell you their followers, current viewers, the game that they are playing, and when their channel was created. Also, in the example phrases, you are meant to replace channel with the twitch channel you want (the last channel.)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
